episode_event_gold_magikarp/4001_1001_01:
What a predicament! Can you help me with
something, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
episode_event_gold_magikarp/4001_1001_02:
The Magikarp Eggs that I had collected for
research have all gone missing!
episode_event_gold_magikarp/4001_1001_03:
It looks like Hoopa played a prank by swapping
them out with the Eggs I give out to
Pasio’s Trainers!
episode_event_gold_magikarp/4001_1001_04:
If you find any sync pairs that have Eggs, could
you tell them what happened and bring them
back to me?
episode_event_gold_magikarp/4001_1001_05:
I imagine you might end up having to battle
those Trainers...
episode_event_gold_magikarp/4001_1001_06:
but I’ll let you keep some of the Magikarp Eggs
you retrieve as a reward for helping me out!
episode_event_gold_magikarp/4001_1001_07: I know Magikarp isn’t a strong Pokémon...
episode_event_gold_magikarp/4001_1001_08:
but I was going to use those Eggs to study
Shiny Pokémon.
episode_event_gold_magikarp/4001_1001_09:
There’s a chance that when they hatch, you might
get a golden surprise!
episode_event_gold_magikarp/4001_0302_13: For a golden one? Of course!
episode_event_gold_magikarp/4001_0402_14:
*chuckle* I understand that feeling well! I can’t
wait to get a closer look at a golden
Magikarp, too!
episode_event_gold_magikarp/4001_1001_16:
I just hope they haven’t already evolved into
raging Gyarados...
